title: Why Are Tech Stocks Getting Murdered? Interest Rates. War. Angst. - Observer
content: Why Are Tech Stocks Getting Murdered? Interest Rates. War. Angst.  Observer
description: Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft are down 19%, 31%, 13%, 38%, and 17% respectively. All are underperforming the S&P 500, and they’re among the fortunate. Netflix has dropped 65% in …
